text: This is the discography of gospel artist Kirk Franklin, an American multi- platinum selling Gospel music singer and producer. In total, Franklin has won fifteen Grammy Awards, thirteen Dove Awards and twenty-eight Stellar Awards. ==Albums== === Studio albums === {|class="wikitable" ! rowspan=2| Year ! rowspan=2 width="200"|
